field.name: description
field.value: The current behaviour of BaseControllerTest is to set the currentUser property to new GenericPricipal(new GenericIdentity). GenericIdentity sets IsAuthenticated to true, however this does not match the default behaviour when running through asp.net as an unauthenticated user, where the IsAuthenticated property is false unless the user is logged in. BaseTestController should set the IsAuthenticated property to false to match what happens when actually using the site and allow the unit test being run to go through whatever authentication is required.
